column1: Baby Barnaby's////There's no hostess to seat you
column2: but you'll see a clipboard hanging from a post on the porch- that's the wait list
column3: so be sure to put your name and party size on there as soon as possible to get in line. Then sit back
column5: and wait for your group to be called. Be careful
column7: because if you miss your call
column8: then you will be crossed off the list and have to wait even longer for a table!
